Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near Ashland/Congress
ShortDescription: #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

Northbound buses will operate via Ashland, Harrison, Damen, Jackson and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Ashland, Van Buren, Damen, Harrison and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Washington
ShortDescription: #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Madison, Western, Fulton and Damen due to street blockage near Damen/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Madison, Western, Fulton, then resume their normal route on Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Damen/Washington.
